name: Garmin Vivoactive 4S
description: A smaller footprint doesn’t mean a smaller feature set. Rock out to your favourite songs, track your steps, keep an eye on your stress and get animated workouts right from your wrist. With its classic watch silhouette the vívoactive 4 doesn’t have the bulk of some smartwatches, but it certainly has the features. Equipped with the latest generation Elevate optical heart-rate monitor that reads your pulse straight off your wrist. GPS and an internal accelerometer track training metrics like speed and distance, turning your movement into data and making sure you get credit for your work in the gym and on the trails. When you need a little personal time, follow along with a mindful breathing exercise, or an animated yoga class to get your day back on track. Pairing it with the free Garmin Connect app on your phone opens up a whole new set of features: review activities, receive notifications, track the weather, control phone apps like Spotify and much more. With the vívoactive on your side you’ll learn more about how you sleep, how you train and how you live.Activity animations offer easy to follow instructions to guide you through the proper form. Animations are available for: strength training, cardio, Pilates and yoga, and there are more than 40 structured workouts between them.Create customized workouts by picking and choosing different exercises from lists of moves.Built-in activity modes for biking, running, walking, swimming (indoor only), strength training (with rep counter), yoga, Pilates and more.Breathwork mode guides you through mindful breathing exercises, helping you with results, from relax and focus, to coherence and more.Respiration tracking keeps an eye on your breaths per minute both while asleep and awake, providing nightly, daily and weekly averages.Garmin Coach provides free, personalized training plans that you can download through Garmin Connect. Train for your first 5k, improve on your next 10k, or just learn to train more efficiently.Move IQ intelligently detects your activity and tracks it; these activities appear in your Connect timeline, so you get credit for all your daily exercise, from taking the stairs at work, to catching that evening spin class.Stream music to your Bluetooth® headphones through a paired phone using Spotify, Amazon Music, etc. Or, download playlists and podcasts directly to your watch via your favourite music service, e.g. Spotify (premium account required), you can even drag and drop MP3s from your computer.Playlists synced from streaming services can be updated when in range of Wi-Fi.Holds up to 500 songs.Body Battery™ tracks your daily energy levels, monitoring what drains your energy (exercise) and recharges your energy (rest, food, etc.), you get a better idea of how and when to train.Garmin Pay™ contact-less payment, lets you make payments with your watch (if supported by your bank).LiveTrack during activities (through a connected phone) allows you to share your location and fitness data.Incident detection uses sensors to detect accidents. In the case of an accident a message and your location will be sent through your paired phone to your emergency contacts.If you feel unsafe, assistance mode sends out a LiveTrack link letting your contacts know where you are.Connects to 3 different satellite constellations (GPS, GLONASS and Galileo) and caches satellite positions, for a fast connection and a strong signal anywhere.Equipped with Garmin’s V3 Elevate™ optical heart rate monitor that even works while swimming. Elevate V3 has a red LED to provide Pulse Ox measurements.Broadcast of your HR over ANT+ (so other devices can pick it up).Stress level score monitors heart rate variability while inactive to produce a stress score from 0-100, the lower the score, the lower your stress.  When stress levels are high, a relaxation timer will guide you through a mindful breathing exercise.Menstrual tracking, track your cycle with Connect, log physical and emotional symptoms and learn about training and nutrition during each phase of your cycle.24/7 activity tracking learns your activity level and guides you towards a more active lifestyle.On board sleep tracking mode monitors your rest, letting you see your breathing patterns, total sleep hours as well as periods of movement and restful sleep in your Connect profile.Counts flights of stairs with internal barometer data that’s combined with your step data.Weekly intensity minutes are displayed against the ideal of 150 needed to maintain a healthy life.Automatically sync your data to paired phone running the free Connect app.Connects with ANT+ and Bluetooth Smart sensors, from foot pods, to speed and cadence pods (no power meters).Connect IQ support allows you to download apps, templates, data fields, watch faces, and other features.Basic waypoint navigation care of the internal GPS and compass.Back to start feature directs you (as the crow flies) to where you started your activity.Intuitive touchscreen and button interface make navigation easy.Always-on, colour display is bright and clear in any conditions.Internal memory stores up to 7 timed activities and 2 weeks worth of daily activity. Garmin Connect will store all of your activity data.User-friendly strap changes, thanks to quick-release pins.In the box: vívoactive 4S, charging/data clip, documentation.
